title: Windrush Lives…You can’t throw us breadcrumbs - Glenda Caesar

media:group.media:title: Windrush Lives…You can’t throw us breadcrumbs - Glenda Caesar
media:group.media:description:
Born in Dominica, raised in the UK from the age of 3 months, Glenda Caesar thought she was British until the hostile governmental immigration policy denied her and her son a British passport. Glenda discusses the impact on her sense of Belonging and what she is doing to help others affected by the Windrush Scandal.

Date: 21st October 2022
